text: aur samajh liya ki (isamen hamaare lie) koee kharaabee na hogee pas (goya) vah log (amr haq se) andhe aur bahare ban gae (magar baavajood isake) jab in logon ne tauba kee to phir khuda ne unakee tauba qubool kar lee (magar) phir (is par bhee) unamen se bahutere andhe aur bahare ban gae aur jo kuchh ye log kar rahe hain allaah to dekhata hai
